<title level="1" right="Rules">[Skill](/Rules.aspx?ID=1089)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 88</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Intelligent items might have skill modifiers for Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma-based skills that fit their nature.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
